pageAttributes.title: Are they right for you?
pageAttributes.summary: Find out how an apprenticeship can change your life. We’ll explain the benefits and how you can earn and learn at the same time.

cards.title: Real stories
cards.metaDescription: Have a look at apprentices who've joined their chosen organisations and watch what they're doing and how becoming an apprentice has changed their career paths.
cards.summary: Find out how becoming an apprentice changes lives.

cards.title: What are the benefits of an apprenticeship?
cards.metaDescription: What are the benefits of an apprenticeship?
cards.summary: Apprenticeships are an exciting option - you get hands-on training and also the chance to put your skills into practice.

cards.title: Help shape their career
cards.metaDescription: Apprenticeships offer the chance to learn, earn and get a degree. As a parent, guardian or carer, you can support your child as they explore their options.
cards.summary: If you're a parent, guardian, carer or teacher of someone, you can help them find a career path that’s right for them.

cards.title: Browse by interest
cards.summary: Find out what type of apprenticeships you can expect in your chosen interest.

cards.title: Alternatives to apprenticeships
cards.metaDescription: An introduction to other career alternatives to apprenticeships such as t levels and traineeships.
cards.summary: There are other career alternatives to apprenticeships which may be more suitable, such as T levels and traineeships.
